artifactIndex.description: Index of document to modify (only required for replace/append operations)

operation.description: Operation to perform: "create" for new documents, "replace" or "append" for existing ones

ArtifactSelectionResponse.description: Response schema for artifact selection operations

artifactIndexes.description: Array of 1-based indexes indicating which artifacts to select

selectionReason.description: Detailed explanation of why these artifacts were selected
examples: Selected these artifacts because they contain the most relevant information about project timelines

BarChartData.description: Represents data for a bar chart visualization

generatedAt.description: Timestamp of when data was generated

data.description: Array of values for each category

description.description: Detailed description of the business goal

action.description: The action to perform with these events

confirmationMessage.description: Confirmation message to show the user

events.description: Array of calendar events to create/update

description.const: Explanation of what the code does

citations.description: Citations from search results used in the content

reference.description: Page or section reference if available

notes.description: Any additional notes about the document

id.description: ID of the section matching the template

notes.description: Any notes about the section content

message.description: A clear restatement of the goal and confirmation of understanding

understanding.description: Whether the goal is clear and actionable

goalAnalysis.description: Detailed analysis of each goal's progress

goalsCompleted.description: List of goal IDs that should be marked complete

goalsInProgress.description: List of goal IDs that should be marked in-progress

goalsUpdated.description: List of goal IDs that were updated

description.description: Description of the goal type and what it's used for

id.description: Unique identifier for the goal template

initialTasks.description: Initial tasks to create when this goal template is selected

name.description: Human-readable name of the goal template

supportingAgents.description: List of agent IDs or types required to support this goal

GoalsAnalysis.description: Represents the analysis of business goals

goals.description: List of broken down business goals

goalRestatement.description: Restated goal of your best understanding of how to achieve the goal (this will be provided to your follow-up tasks)

shouldContinue.description: true to proceed with next steps, false to wait for answers from user.

currentFocus.description: The plan item we are focused on achieving right now, indexed from 1 to n.

links.description: Array of selected links that are relevant to the research goal

text.description: The visible text of the link

sequence.description: The sequence you are planning to follow (or "none")

taskDescription.description: The goal for performing this action type

OutlineApprovalCheck.description: Response from checking if an outline has been approved

approved.description: Whether the outline has been approved

changesNeeded.description: List of requested changes if not approved

confidence.description: Confidence score (0-100) in the approval assessment

feedbackSummary.description: Brief summary of the feedback provided

description.description: Detailed description of the section content

keyPoints.description: Key points to be covered in the section

rationale.description: Why these searches will help reach the goal

QuickQueriesResponse.description: Interface for quick mode queries response

ResearchFinding.description: Interface for a key research finding

relevance.description: How relevant this finding is to the goal

ResearchUnderstandingResponse.description: Response interface for research goal understanding analysis

goal.description: Your understanding of the research goal

proceedWithResearch.description: Whether the research request is clear enough to proceed

proposedDetails.description: Proposed details and assumptions to clarify the research scope

detail.description: The specific detail or assumption being proposed

reasoning.description: Explanation of why this detail matters

RoutingResponse.description: Response from the RouterAgent when determining how to route a message

nextStep.description: The next step to take in the conversation

response.description: The message to send to the user or transferring agent

selectedAgent.description: The selected agent to handle the request

SchemaType.description: Enum representing all available generated schema types

rationale.description: Explanation for why this query was chosen

category.description: The search category - use 'news' for current events, otherwise 'general'

searchQuery.description: A web search query. For news searches, include relevant keywords

SectionImprovement.description: Represents improvements for a content section

suggestions.description: List of suggestions for this section

dueDate.description: Either a ISO-formatted Date/Time or a ISO Duration field

taskId.description: UUID of task to update/delete, blank if creating

TaskReviewStatus.description: Represents the status of a task in the review process

selectedTemplateId.description: The ID of the selected template

conclusion.description: Final conclusion based on the reasoning

urls.description: Array of URLs extracted from the text

isComplete.description: Whether the solution fully addresses the original goal

missingAspects.description: List of aspects that still need to be addressed

WebSearchResponse.description: Represents the structured response for web search results selection

urls.description: Array of selected URLs most relevant to the research goal

relevance.description: Whether the content is relevant to the task

summary.description: Markdown formatted summary of relevant content
